THE_GAME_IS_PLAYED:
THE GAME IS PLAYED WITH 243 BET WAYS.

THERE ARE NO BET LINES.

MATCHING SYMBOLS IN ANY POSITION ON THREE OR MORE ADJACENT REELS, STARTING FROM LEFTMOST
REEL TO THE RIGHTMOST REEL, RESULT IN A BET WAY WIN.

BET WAY WINS PAY IF IN SUCCESSION FROM THE LEFTMOST REEL TO THE RIGHTMOST REEL.
MORE_BET_WAY:
MORE BET WAY WINS ARE CREATED WHEN ADDITIONAL INSTANCES OF THE SYMBOL APPEAR ON THE SAME REELS
THAT CREATE THE LONGEST BET WAY WIN.
sidebar_Rules_text1:
Zen Zen Cash is a 5-reel, 3x5 video slot game and 243 ways pays, featuring Linking Reels ™, Jackpot Pick'em Game and Free Spins Bonus.
All ways are always played.
sidebar_Rules_MysteryCloningReels_text1:
Each basic and free spins reel strip contains linking symbols that are replaced with one random symbol after each reel spin is complete. All linking symbols are replaced with the same symbol per spin.
All symbols between two or more linking ones are transformed into additional linking symbols.
Linking symbols may be replaced with any symbol except dragon envelope and bonus scatter symbols.
sidebar_Rules_Wilds_text1:
Wild symbols substitute for all symbols except dragon envelope and bonus scatter symbols.
Wild symbols appear during linking reels ™ feature only. Wild 2x and Wild 3x multiply the win combination in which they play correspondingly. Several wild multipliers in a win combination will be multiplied on each other up to 32x for five wild x2 and up to 243x for five wild 3x symbols.
sidebar_Rules_DragonEnvelopes_text1: 2 dragon envelope symbols on the screen activate the jackpot pick'em game. Dragon envelopes appear on 1 and 5 reels only.
sidebar_Rules_BonusScatter_text1: 3 bonus scatters on the screen activate the Free Spins bonus game. Bonus scatters appear on 2, 3 and 4 reels only. Bonus scatters appear in the basic game only.
sidebar_Rules_FreeSpinsBonus_text1: 3 bonus symbols award 15 free spins. The first reel is covered by linking symbols during free spins.
sidebar_Rules_PickemBonus_text1: WHEN THE JACKPOT PICK'EM IS TRIGGERED, 35 COINS APPEAR. PICK A COIN TO REVEAL A JACKPOT SYMBOL. PICK SYMBOLS UNTIL WIN ONE OF THE JACKPOTS. ONLY ONE JACKPOT PRIZE CAN BE AWARDED DURING BONUS.
sidebar_Rules_WaysPays_text1:
For Ways Pays, winning combinations are paid for symbols appearing in any position on consecutive reels from left to right, starting with the leftmost reel. Only the highest matching combination for each symbol is paid. The total pay amount from ways pays is the sum of the pay for each distinct symbol that has a winning combination.

For ways pays, for each symbol, at most combination is paid and that is the ways pay across the greatest number of matching columns.

Wins for ways pays of different symbols are added together and to the total win.

Scatter pays are added to Ways Pays and to the total win.

Wins for different symbols are added together and to the total win.
sidebar_Rules_HowPlay_text1:
Just follow the 3 steps to play the GAME:

1. Choose your total bet
2. Press the SPIN symbol button
3. Check for any win in the WIN field

Description of game functionality
sidebar_Rules_Bet_text1: The Total Bet is shown in the bottom part of the screen. It can be changed by tapping/clicking on the "+" or "-" icons on the BET panel.
sidebar_Rules_Spin_text1:
The game is started by pressing the SPIN button.

You can Quick Stop the game by clicking (for desktop displays) or touching (for touch-enabled displays) anywhere on the stop button.

Pressing the SPACE key on a keyboard has the same function as pressing the SPIN button.
sidebar_Rules_Win_text1: Any total win in a game round will be displayed in the WIN field.
sidebar_Rules_Paytable_text1: All winning combinations in the game can be viewed in the PAYTABLE which can be reached through the "i" button in the game menu.
sidebar_Rules_Autoplay_text1:
Using Autoplay will let you play a number of game rounds automatically.

Press AUTOPLAY and choose a number of game rounds to initiate Autoplay.

The remaining number of spins is displayed in the UI.

Autoplay is stopped by pressing the STOP button.

The autoplay settings allow the player to set the number of plays in the current game session.

Autoplay will stop when the selected number of plays limit is exceeded.

Malfunction in the game voids all pays.

In case of any discrepancies or disputes, the English version of the Game Rules shall be treated as the authoritative text.
